thread.title: Loveholidays reviewed by Joanne Frank

author: Joanne Frank
title: Loveholidays reviewed by Joanne Frank
text: Awful customer service! 3 weeks after being told I would receive a refund and ignored by their customer service dept for a week after emailing then on numerous occasions i received an email abd waa told ww suggest you call them only to be cut off on each occasion. Shocking lack of customer focus and service l
